div.label: English
div.div: Add a one-line explanation of what this file represents

td.div: Mìng-dĕ̤ng-ngṳ̄: 朝鮮國旗 / Dièu-siēng guók-gì

a.title: fr:Drapeau de la Corée du Nord

div.a: Drapeau de la Corée du Nord

td.div: 贛語: 朝鮮民主主義人民共和國國旗

a.title: ja:朝鮮民主主義人民共和国の国旗

div.a: 朝鮮民主主義人民共和国の国旗

td.div: Қазақша: Koreya Xalıqtıq Demokratiyalıq Respublikasınıñ Memlekettik bayrağı / Корея Халықтық Демократиялық Республикасының Мемлекеттік байрағы
文言: 朝鮮民主主義人民共和國之國旗

div.div: Bân-lâm-gú: 朝鮮民主主義人民共和國的國旗 / Tiâu-sián Bîn-chú-chú-gī Jîn-bîn Kiōng-hô-kok ê kok-kî-á

td.div: Српски / srpski: Застава Северне Кореје / Zastava Severne Koreje

a.title: th:ธงชาติเกาหลีเหนือ

div.a: ธงชาติเกาหลีเหนือ

td.div: Татарча/tatarça: Koreya Xalık Demokratik Cömhüriyateneñ Däwlät bayrağı
ئۇيغۇرچە / Uyghurche: شىمالىي چاۋشيەن دۆلەت بايرىقى
Oʻzbekcha/ўзбекча: Koreya Xalq Demokratik Respublikasining Davlat bayrogʻi
Tiếng Việt: 國旗共和民主人民朝鮮 / Quốc kỳ Cộng hòa Dân chủ Nhân dân Triều Tiên
吴语: 朝鮮民主主義人民共和國國旗
粵語: 朝鮮民主主義人民共和國國旗

div.a: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国国旗
朝鮮民主主義人民共和國國旗

tr.td: Own work based on 新國旗의 製定과 太極旗의 廢止에 對하여 and 조선민주주의인민공화국 국기법

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

tr.td:
This work was first published in North Korea and is now in the public domain because its copyright protection has expired by virtue of the Copyright Law of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, enacted 2001, amended 2006 (details). The work meets one of the following criteria:
It is a work of an institution, enterprise or organization, and 50 years have passed since the date of its publication
It is another kind of work, and 50 years have passed since the year of death of the author (or last-surviving author)
It is a "work whose publication, issuance, performance, broadcasting, show and exhibition is prohibited" in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea
It is ineligible for copyright protection because it is a "document for state management" without a commercial purpose
English ∙ Tiếng Việt ∙ 조선말 ∙ 한국어 ∙ 日本語 ∙ 中文（简体） ∙ 中文（繁體） ∙ +/−

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.i: This work is ineligible for copyright and therefore in the public domain because it consists entirely of information that is common property and contains no original authorship.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

tr.td: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

td.p:
This file was derived from: Flag of North Korea.svg
This vector image includes elements that have been taken or adapted from this file: Flag of North Korea.svg.
td.div: See also categories: Flags of North Korea, SVG flags of North Korea and SVG flags - historical of North Korea.

tr.td: iThe source code of this SVG is valid.

td.span: This vector image was created with a text editor.

div.p: The video colors approximation is listed below:

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

tr.td:
Legal disclaimer
This image is or contains a symbol or symbols prohibited by law in the nations mentioned below, due to (variously) representations of communism, socialism, or similar governmental structures; or of parties/organizations associated with said:
Ukraine's Verkhovna Rada (article 436-1 of the Criminal code of Ukraine)
Georgia's parliament
Hungary: Act C of 2012 on the Criminal Code, Section 335
Latvia's Saeima
Lithuania's Constitutional Court passed Article 18818 of the Code of Administrative Offences
Germany's Criminal Code §86a, referring to the "use of symbols of unconstitutional organizations" outside the contexts of "art or science, research or teaching"
Indonesia's People's Consultative Assembly
Bans no longer in effect include:
Moldova: LPC192/2012ro,ru
Poland: Art. 256 of the Dz.U. 1997 nr 88 poz. 553 of the criminal code has removed references to imagery and now only covers promotion of communist ideas
Imagery covered may include the hammer and sickleen, red star, emblems/insignias, flags or images of leaders.

div.p: View more global usage of this file.

This file contains additional information such as Exif metadata which may have been added by the digital camera, scanner, or software program used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details such as the timestamp may not fully reflect those of the original file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
